Package reactor.core

Core components of the Reactor framework.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Dispatcher
    A Dispatcher is used to Dispatcher.dispatch(Object, Consumer, Consumer) dispatch} data to Consumers.
    DispatcherSupplier
    A Dispatcher Supplier with shutdown capacities to clean produced dispatchers.

Package reactor.core Description

Core components of the Reactor framework. Mainly Message-Passing facilities between resources( Dispatcher, Allocator, Queues...). Can be used outside Reactor, it is mainly powering RX and BUS modules.
